titles.title: Take The Name Of Jesus With You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Precious name, O how sweet! newline Hope of earth and joy of heaven. newline Precious name, O how sweet! newline Hope of earth and joy of heaven.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take the name of Jesus with you. newline Child of sorrow and of woe. newline It will joy and comfort give you; newline Take it then where'er you go.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take the name of Jesus ever, newline As a shield from every snare. newline If temptations round you gather, newline Breathe that holy name in prayer.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: O the precious name of Jesus! newline How it thrills our souls with joy. newline When His loving arms receive us newline And His songs our tongues employ!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: At the name of Jesus bowing, newline Falling prostrate at His feet. newline King of kings in heaven we'll crown Him, newline When our journey is complete.
